All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, CommandListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.MenuElement, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
WindowMenu
public class CommandMenu
extends javax.swing.JMenu
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, CommandListener

A Command enabled menu. Selecting a menu item executes the corresponding command.

Version:
<$CURRENT_VERSION$>
See Also:
Command, Serialized Form
